projectDesc.p: The edition was scanned in 2008 at Leiden University by Arlo Griffiths with the help of his assistant Shila Schoots. Based on these scans, the edition was rekeyed 2009 by typists based in South India whose work was coordinated by Thomas Malten. The work was done at the time with a low budget furnished by Arlo Griffiths and left a lot to be desired. It has remained dormant for nearly 15 years and has now (Febr. 2024) started to be gradually cleaned up.

div.head:
{@sāraḷā mahābhārata
nārīparba
pāṇḍabaṅkara hastinā prabeśa, dhr̥ta rāṣṭraṅkara śoka
o
gāndhārīṅka netra jaḷare durddakṣara dahana@}

lg.l: baibasuta manu ye bilaṁka deśara rājā
agastiṁka pādapadme kaleka dibyapūjā | 1 |
paraṁbrahma tumbhe aṭa nirañjana debatā
taba śrīmukhuṁ śiṇimi muṁ mahābhārata bāratā | 2 |
parīkṣa janma hoiṇa labhile jībita
teṇukari parīkṣa nāma dileka jagatanātha | 3 |
dusaha parīkṣāru yahuṁ upujilā bāḷa
teṇukari parīkṣa nāma hoilā cirakāḷa | 4 |
ẏethi uttāru kisa hoilā brahmabettā
kahibā muni he ẏethira tadanta bāratā | 5 |
kahanti agastiẏe paṇḍita brahmaruṣi
sābadhāna hoi śuṇa rājā śe kapaboṅgra udeśi | 6 |
śuṇa ho baibasuta manu badaẏanti ye agasti
uttarā prāṇatyāja hoilā aśastamāra śasragati | 7 |
bārānidhi tīre tāra kale pretakāryya
śuddhaśrāddha kari uturile debarāja | 8 |
pañchadaśa dibasare kr̥ṣṇaṁkara pāśe basi
yujheṣṭhi debe boile śuṇimā ruṣīkeśi | 9 |
ẏe putra goṭiki deba pāḷibāka yatane
ẏehāuṁ byatrake baṁśa rakṣaṇe nāhiṁṭi āna jaṇe | 10 |
athabā ẏehākaiṁ na sambhāḷile debarāja
buḍilā somabaṁśa āu nāhiṁṭi kicchi kāryya | 11 |
tu deba sakaḷa jībaṁkara ātmā pañcha bhūta
tote tiāribā pāiṁ muṁ kisa sāmaratha | 12 |
sarbadā bratuṁ āmbhe tumbhanta āśre kari
yāucchi indra praśaste muṁ dekhibi dhr̥tirāṣṭa gāndhārī | 13 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa boile muhiṁ yibaiṁ indra ye praśaste
kisa uttara tumbhanta diai dhr̥tirāṣṭa mahīpatye | 14 |
pañcha pāṇḍabe tahuṁ pañchuratha ārohi
garuḍa piṭhire bijaẏe kale deba jagusāiṁ | 15 |
kointā dropatī pañchupāṇḍabaṁkara tule
indrapraśasta abhimukhe turite caḷile | 16 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa āgyāṁdile bhīmasenakaiṁ rāi
to tahuṁ pāṇḍabaṁku bābu āna sākhā nāhiṁ | 17 |
dhr̥tirāṣṭa gāndhārīṁka ye śatetaputra kaṣṭa
tote dekhi aneka trodha kariba dhr̥tirāṣṭa | 18 |
aneka baikulye ho tote rāiba katiki
tu ho brikodara yibu nāhiṁṭi tāhāra tahiṁki | 19 |
kṣatrībara baḷiṣṭha se mahābaḷī pracaṇḍā
mahāparbata chāpante se hoiyiba masīgṇḍa | 20 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa kahile yahuṁ catrakūṭa buddhi
yauṁ deba māẏāre saẏaḷa jana kāryya hoẏe siddhi | 21 |
kahuṁ kahuṁ śrīkr̥ṣṇa ye patha gamiyānte
prabeśa hoile yāiṁ kaṭaka indra ye praśaste | 22 |

div.note: niścaẏe buḍilā somabaṁśaru aiśuryya |(ka, kha, ṭha, na)

lg.l: dekhile kaṭaka ye hoicchi bhaganasta
pāñchāḷa kumare māhānti bolanti acyuta | 23 |
dropatī boile nāhānti bhrāthamāne mohora
ke mohora putranta kalāka apahāra | 24 |
ẏete boliṇa dropatī ye trodha kalā
hā hā putra boliṇa ye bhūiṁre paḍilā | 25 |
yujheṣṭhi bhīma arjuna nakuḷa sahadeba ye bīra
pāñchāḷa kumaranta na dekhi trodha kaleka apāra | 26 |
kointāẏe boile tu śuṇa śirīpati
bāḷuta putranta kehu kalāka ẏe gati | 27 |
śuṇiṇa nārāẏaṇa ye bacana prakāśi
trodha chadi māgo badaẏanti ruṣīkeśi | 28 |
bibāde paśi go tumbhara kisa bhala
tumbhe go kaurobanta kete abastā na kala | 29 |
ẏebe trodha karucha kimpe tuhi māẏe
ẏete kahi yujheṣṭhiṁki toḷi dhaile debarāẏe | 30 |
pañchu pāṇḍabaṁku trodha śānti ye karāi
srāhāna karāile deba yadusāiṁ | 31 |
pretakāryya sāribe ẏekādaśa dina
samasta muruchāile deba puruṣottama | 31 |
yujheṣṭhi boile ho śuṇimā bāsudeba
hastinā purakaiṁ yibā dekhibā dhr̥tirāṣṭa bidura ādi sarba | 33 |
ẏete boliṇa saja hoile sakaḷe
durddakṣa bhīma arjuna nakuḷa sahadeba mūḷe | 34 |
badaẏanti agasti śuṇa baibasuta manu
pañchupāṇḍabe ābara ye debakīṁka tanu | 35 |
dhr̥tirāṣṭa nabareṇa turite parabeśa
dvāreṇa bidure ye dekhile pañcha śiṣa | 36 |
badaẏanti yujheṣṭhi deba bidura agrate
dhr̥tarāṣṭaṁka chamuka pitā yibāka kemante | 37 |
yujheṣṭhiṁka bacane bidura yāiṁ kahi
pañchupāṇḍabe bho deba hāde aile tora tahiṁ | 38 |
bidura bacane ye bolai dhr̥tirāṣṭa
kimbate aile mote sumarāi putra kaṣṭa | 39 |
māile karṇṇa śakuni puṇa bhūrisarba
ābara śateputra droṇa ye gāṅgabā | 40 |
māile bandhu sodara mohora sarba sakhā
mohora bipatti tāhāṁkara sampada ye dekhā | 41 |
yāāntu se pāṇḍabe ho ẏeṇe mohora kisa kāryya
samaste nikaḷaṁka kale ẏebe sukhe karantu rājya | 42 |
bidure boile ẏebe śuṇimā kurusāiṁ
pāṇḍabanta tohora ẏete kopa kāhiṁpāiṁ | 43 |
pāṇḍabaṁkara ẏethi nāhiṁ kicchi doṣamāna
tuhi se kuḷakṣaẏa karāilu ho rājana | 44 |
śateka asata putra jātakalu nr̥pa
ghotile pāṇḍabanta jāṇi jīrṇṇakūpa | 45 |
ādihuṁ nakalu tu kāhāri ye bola
ẏekāputra tejithile samasta hvantā bhai | 46 |
ẏekāputra tejibāku mane byathā kalu
āpaṇāra kalākr̥ta pare doṣa dilu | 47 |
āpaṇāra kalākr̥tya ẏebe kimpe bimukha hou
saṁhāthe biṣa khāi pare dukha deu | 48 |

div.note: –saṁhāte = svaẏaṁ haste |

lg.l: yāhākaiṁ sampakṣa aṭanti śrībatsa
tāhā tahuṁ deba kehu hoiba āna dakṣa | 49 |
aneka maṇāi kari yahuṁ bidura kahile
śuṇikari dhr̥tirāṣṭa maunabrata ye hoile | 50 |
bidure boiel śate putranta marāi
nirlaja ātmā ẏebe na galā kisa pāiṁ | 51 |
bratibāku iccha yebe kara dhr̥tirāṣṭa
pāṇḍabanta koḷakari pāsora putrakaṣṭa | 52 |
markhapaṇa kari tu habailu sarba kāryya
buddhi harai thoke loka pāanti baḍa lāja | 53 |
āho caitana aneka paramārtha yahuṁ kahile bidura
śuṇiṇa trodha manu chaḍilā kurubīra | 54 |
dhr̥tirāṣṭa boile bidura tumbhe pāṇḍabanta bege āṇa
kisa arthe aile buhibā tathya puṇa | 55 |
dhr̥tirāṣṭe bujhāi bidure aile
āsaho śrīkr̥ṣṇa, yujheṣṭhi, dhr̥tirāṣṭa āgyāṁ dile | 56 |
śuṇiṇa bhitare paśile yujheṣṭhi debasvāmī
dhrtirāṣṭa caraṇe pāñcheheṁ pariṇāmi | 57 |
gāndhārī boile tahuṁ śuṇare ātmaja
mohora śateputra māila tohora kisa kāryya | 58 |
rājya pāikari ḷaṁghalumā dharma
aneka hatyākari arjalu ati ye akarma | 59 |
gāndhārī boile muṁ yeuṁṇa kāḷe bibhā hoithili
svāmī andha boli mora śrabaṇe śunili | 60 |
bhrathāṁkara yebe mora na diśilā naẏana
mohora paramukha chāhiṁbāre kisa pirojana | 61 |

div.note: āho caitana aneka puruṣārtha kahile bidura |(ka, da, jha)

lg.l: muhiṁ andha paṭaḷa bānddhali svāmīra nimante
śateputra mukha chāhiṁli brtithile kāḷa yete | 62 |
ẏebe andha paṭaḷa pheḍa dekhai tumbhara mukha
tumbhanta dekhi pāsorai putraṁkara dukha | 63 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa bolanti bābu sahadeba śuṇa
ẏehāra andha paṭaḷa pheibāra kebaṇa kāraṇa | 64 |
sahadeba boiel andha paṭaḷa phei chāhiṁba yāhāre
abaśya dahija hoiba se rakhi nohiba tāhāre | 65 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa boile sahadeba mukha chāhiṁ
śatr̥ra śeṣa lośa rakhita na yogāi | 66 |
ẏe āmbhara tule ye achai durddakṣa
se andha paṭaḷa phei chāhuṁ mātāra mukha | 67 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa boile yāiṁ durddakṣara āge
gāndhārī andha paṭaḷa pheḍasi bābu bege | 68 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa bacane se gāndhārīra bāḷa
durddakṣa pheilā mātā gāndhārīra andha ye paṭaḷa | 69 |
āho caitana cakṣu maḷi gāndhārī chāhiṁla mukha toḷi
durddakṣara śarīra tatakṣaṇe uṭhilāka jaḷi | 70 |
pāṇḍabanta gheni antara hoile bāsudeba
bidure boile gāndhārī mandakr̥tya kalu ẏebe | 71 |
yujheṣṭhira tahiṁ śaraṇa paśilā tohora batsa
tāhāku dahana kalu se tohora durddakṣa | 72 |
gāndhārī boile muṁ ye ādihuṁ andhajāta
muṁ kehne jāṇimi se ye mohora santati | 73 |
gāndhārī boilā muṁ ye mandakr̥tya kali
cihni nuāri putraku akhaḍe māili | 74 |

div.note: pāsoribi garbhakaṣṭa putraṁkara dukha |(ka, ṇa, ta, ja)

lg.l: śrīkr̥ṣṇa boile māgo se tohora putragoṭi
śaraṇa galā tāhāku rakṣā kale yujheṣṭhi | 75 |
ye thilā tohora andhara lauḍi
tāhākuhiṁ nāśakalu bipāka karma tohori | 76 |
ẏebe bāhuḍi andha paṭaḷa bāndha tohora mukhai
yujheṣṭhiṁki dahija kale dharma na gacchai | 77 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa boile go pāṇḍabe tohora bāḷa
nija putranta pāsori ẏehānta pratipāḷa | 78 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇaṁka bacane gāndharī kopa kala śānti
puṇi andha paṭaka bānddhalā tatakṣaṇānti | 79 |
durddakṣa nidhane dhr̥tirāṣṭa baḍa kaṣṭi
indra samāne pāithili śate putragoṭi | 80 |
anteṇa tanaẏa muṁ na pāilaiṁ ẏeka
karmara abaḷe dekha goṭiẏe nohilā prāpateka | 81 |
śrī gobinde boile tāta pāṇḍabe tohora bāḷa
tāhānta pāsori ẏehānta kara ẏebe koḷa | 82 |

div.note: –tāhākuhiṁ nāśakalma prākarma tohori |(jha, ṭa, ca)
–tāhākuhiṁ nāśakalma hinakarma tohori |(ṇa, ṛha)

div.head:
{@dhr̥tarāṣṭraṅka dvārā lohabhīma cūryya o gāndhārīra
śrīkr̥ṣṇaṅku śāpa pradāna@}

lg.l: dhr̥tirāṣṭa boile āre mohora bābu bhāmā
tote koḷakari pāsoribi mohora trodha ātmā | 1 |
koḷa prasāriṇa ḍakai ambikāra suta
śuṇiṇa bhīmasena uṭhilā turita | 2 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇā jāṇile dhr̥tirāṣṭara mandacintā
bhīmasenakaiṁ ghuñchāi āṇile jagujita | 3 |
āsa āsare bhīmasena tote koḷa muṁ karai
śate putraṁkara muṁ putrakaṣṭa pāsorai | 4 |
tahuṁ luhra bhīmeka ye āṇile debahari
dhr̥tirāṣṭa koḷe dile ātreṣaṇa kari | 5 |
maha baḷabantā dhr̥tirāṣṭa bajrasenā
bhmaje bhiḍante lohāra bhīma hoilāka cūnā | 6 |
baibasuta manuẏe pucchā kale agasti
baḍāi āśrija kathā ta kahila brahmayati | 7 |
lohāra bhīma kāhiṁ thilā ẏeḍe yoga
dhātikāre kr̥ṣṇa āṇi dile ati bege | 8 |
agasti boile āho śuṇisi subuddhi
dhr̥tirāṣṭa śateputra upujilā bidhi | 9 |
dhr̥tirāṣṭa boile śuṇisi bidura
puanta āṇare muṁ dharai koḍara | 10 |
bidura boilā tohora jyeṣṭhaputra ẏeṭi
ẏekāṅga chatra se hoiba nabasr̥ṣṭi | 11 |
śaṅkhanidhi padmanidhi achai tāhāra kare
padma biṅghasaiṭi yāhāra paẏare | 12 |
aneka rājāra hoiba mauḍamaṇi
anubrate ẏehāra kandhu na chaḍibe kamaḷiṇi | 13 |
ẏehāra lakṣaṇa mote diṇai lalāṭa pāṭire
bhīmara hāthare badha se hoiba śeṣakāḷe | 14 |
karkaśa madhapiṅgaḷa aṭe ẏā prakr̥ti
ẏe putra māri aneśvata putra gheni hoa ẏekāṅga catrabratī | 15 |
ẏehāre baṁśa tohora hoiba binaśyati
bege ẏehākaiṁ nāśakara śīghragati | 16 |
dhr̥tirāṣṭe boile ẏeheneka mohora bitakṣaṇa putra
rājyadhara putrakaiṁ muṁ nāśa karibi kemanta | 17 |
lohāra bhīmeka ye gaṛhāilā dhr̥tirāṣṭa
driyodhanakaiṁ bolanti ẏehāku niṭhāiṇa piṭa | 18 |
lohagiri sama aṭe ẏehra dīrghastaḷī
piṭiṇa putra tu hua mahābaḷī | 19 |
se lohāra bhīmakaiṁ ākhaḍāśāḷe thāpi
tāhāku ātreṣiṇa driyodhana nitye gadā pradāra karai kṣepi | 20 |
bhīmaku māribāku nitye karai abhyāsa
ākhaḍāśāḷe thāi se rātra ye dibasa | 21 |
se lohāra bhīmaku bahi āṇile bhīma arjuna nakuḷa sahadeba chāriheṁ
dhr̥tirāṣṭara koḷe basāile sandehe | 22 |
se bhīmaku chāpile dhr̥tirāṣṭa nr̥pati
koḷe āmañchane guṇḍi hoilā tatakṣaṇānti | 23 |
āho caitana dhr̥tirāṣṭa mukharu ghana ghana bahai śroṇi
paḍilā dhr̥tirāṣṭa ye bajāghāta jāṇi | 24 |

div.note:
lohagiri samāne ẏehāra śarīra
niti tā saṅge laṛhai driyodhana bīra |(kha, na, ṭha)

lg.l: daśa sahasr amattahāthīra prātrama se lohāra bhīmasena
beni ahibrata hāthīra prātrama dhr̥tirāṣṭa rājana | 25 |
koḷe dhari bidure ye mukhe jaḷa siñchi
sāṣṭāma nimante se ālāṭa dhari biñchi | 26 |
cetanā pāiṇa se nr̥pati dhr̥tirāṣṭa
bhīmara nāma dharise robai mahākaṣṭa | 27 |
kuḷa maṇḍana putra āre mohora brikodara
akāda samodre muṁ paśili mūrkha chara | 28 |
tohora parā putra māili muṁ manda
āu ki pheri āsiba mo mānagobinda | 29 |
kāhiṁki bhīmasenaku muhiṁ ye māili
kimpāi ẏeheneka mandakarma kali
bhīmakaiṁ māri ki mohora putranta pāili | 30 |
aneka biḷāpa karai dhr̥tirāṣṭa
tāhā śuṇi bhīmasena adhara kala puṣṭa | 31 |
gadā bulāiṇa ye māri loḍai bhīma
yujheṣṭhi boile bābu pitāku na kara tama | 32 |
putraṁka nidhane hoiacchi bairāgī
patāmaha ẏe aṭanti ẏehāra doṣa parityāgi | 33 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa boiel ho śuṇasi dhr̥tirāṣṭa
bhīmaku māilu tora ẏebe galā ta putrakaṣṭa | 34 |
ābara trodha tu ye karu kisa arthe
br̥ddhakāḷe rājya tuhi kara ho nicinte | 35 |
bhīmāra nidhane pāṇḍabe hoiel nirimākṣā
trodha sambhāḷa mahārājā hoilu mahāsukhī | 36 |
lg.note:
tote māili bābure labhili ki yaśa
ẏeḍe mandapaṇa kimpe kali muṁ bāḷīkha |(kha, na, ṭha)
lg.l: śrīkr̥ṣṇara bacane hasai dhr̥tirāṣṭa
trodha śānti hoi pāsorilā putra kaṣṭa | 37 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa boile tumbhe śuṇa mahārāẏe
tohori bole ki bhīma hoibaṭi kṣaẏe | 38 |
bhīmasena boilā sukhī hoila ho pitā
muhiṁṭi bhīmasena tohora śate putrahantā | 39 |
ẏeheneka kuṭabuddhire ki pāṇḍabanta pāi
sarbagyaṁ puruṣa nātha yāhāku aṭanti sāhi | 40 |
aneka jhiṁghāsi ye boile pābeni
dhr̥tirāṣṭa cakṣuru bahai jaḷa śrābaṇa dhārā jāṇi | 41 |
koḷe dhari bidura dhr̥tirāṣṭakaiṁ boile
trodha sambhāḷa bhrāta kicchi kāryyata nohilā | 42 |
dhr̥tirāṣṭa boile muṁ kehne deha dharibi
putraṁka abhābe muṁ kisa ye karibi | 43 |
chāla ho bidura yibā ẏebe kurukṣetra
ratha ārohiṇa caḷile turita | 44 |
sañjaẏa sārathi ye bāhilāka ratha
śrīkr̥ṣṇa sahite gale pāṇḍaba pañcha bhrātha | 45 |
dhr̥tirāṣṭa gāndhārī sañjaẏe bidura
prabeśa hoile yāiṁ kurukṣetra maṇḍaḷara | 46 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa pāṇḍabanta gheniṇa caḷigale
benibaṁśaru terajaṇa mātraka rahithile | 47 |
kurukṣetra madhye yāiṁ prabeśa hoithile
śrīkr̥ṣṇa agrate tahuṁ gāndhārī boile | 48 |
andhapaṭaḷa mukharu pheile gāndhārī
dekhai baṁśayāka achai apahāri | 49 |
dekha dekha śrīkr̥ṣṇa ẏe kurukṣetra bhūiṁ
kimpe ratha yāna chaḍi śoileka mahī | 50 |
dvādaśa yojana yāẏe mr̥tupiṇḍa pari
ẏekaku āreka śoichanti āliṅgana kari | 51 |
aneka rājāẏe aile ẏe bhmaataḷe
śr̥tile raṇabhūmire aḷakāra nātha jāṇi kāminīṁka meḷe | 52 |
ratnara kaṁkaṇamāna rabira teja jāṇi diśi
candra kiṇe yehne birājilā niśi | 53 |
samasta niropaṇa chāhiṁi gāndhārī
dekhilā sanya senā aneka chanti pūri | 54 |
nisepi chāhānte gāndhārasena dulāḷī
śara śeyyāẏe gāṅgeba katire yāiṁ miḷi | 55 |
dekha dekha śrīkr̥ṣṇa ẏe śāẏantanura suta
sāṁgrāme surāsura jiṇimāku ẏe sāmaratha | 56 |
niropai gāndharī bhīṣmaṁkara mukha
mama putraṁka āśrite pāile ẏete dukha | 57 |
dhany ẏe bhīṣme kurubaṁśe upujile
pitāra nimante ẏekṣaha dārā parityāja kale | 58 |
icchāẏe mr̥tu ẏe pāileka barai
nohile ki bhīṣma raṇabhūmire paḍai | 59 |
gāndhārī boilā ẏehemeka kr̥ta kala bābu
gata āgataku bābure buḍāi sabu | 60 |
bābu bhūrisarba bāihika kaḷiṅgasena somadatte
baṁśika lokanta re naśa kalaṭi kemante | 61 |
lg.note:
āliṅgana prāẏe hoi paṛichanti sarba baḷe
yesaneke putra śoithāi mātā koḷe |(ṭa)
candra kiraṇa prāẏe rūpa ye bikāśi |(ṭa)
kiṁthāi ẏe bhīṣma rakhabhūmire paḍithāi |(dha, ḍha, da, ṭha)
lg.l: bho kr̥ṣṇa jāṇikai muṁ bhīṣmaṁkara rīti
āpaṇe marikari pāntabanta kale prīti | 62 |
pāṇḍabaṁku sneha ẏe karanti sarba dine
ẏehānta pāṇḍabare māila kesane | 63 |
tahuṁ śokakari gāndhārī caḷai trodha citte
dekhilā paḍichanti bhāradvādaśaṁka sute | 64 |
he kr̥ṣṇacandra ẏehu droṇaguru ye aṭanti
ke ẏehākaiṁ jiṇite sāmaratha ẏehu pr̥thī | 65 |
acaḷa chāḷibāku ke hoilā samaratha
pr̥htī toḷi dharibāku ke hoilā ẏekachatra | 66 |
aṇachāśa mr̥rtta dhari yebe bahai pabana
tebe se jāṇibānā ho droṇaṁkara nidhana | 67 |
kebaṇahiṁ roḷa ẏe deba ye murāri
kimpāiṁ droṇe ye paḍile prāṇahāri | 68 |
koḷeṇa andharājā dhariṇa robante
hā hā bolikari tahiṁ rodana diante | 69 |
yāhā tahuṁ śikhi bidyā, pātha debakāryya kalā
tāhakaiṁ kesaneke raṇeṇa māilā | 70 |
āho kr̥ṣṇa, droṇa āchāryye ẏehāṁkara guru
mohora putranta chaḍi ẏehānta snehakaru | 71 |
droṇa āchāryye arjunaku bahuta snehakari
kemante sata baḷilā ẏehānta bahdakari | 72 |
piara guru nāśakari kisa ẏehāṁkra sukha
guru badhakala chāṇḍāḷe re tumbhara na chāhiṁ ye mukha | 73 |
trodha kariṇa tahuṁ caḷai gāndhārī
dekhai āgare ye karṇṇa śaraghāte acchi paḍi | 74 |
lg.note:
bho kr̥ṣṇa jāṇilaiṁ mu bhīṣṁaṁkara citta
āpaṇe malā ẏe kalā pāṇḍabaṅka hita |(ka, ṇa)
lg.l: dekhiṇa gāndhārī ye bolai kr̥ṣṇe chāhiṁ
trailokye ajaẏe karṇṇa chaḍilā kehne dehī | 75 |
ẏehāra bāhubaḷaku āśrekari putra yuddha kalā
ẏeḍe baḍa bīra kehne kurukṣetra maṇḍaḷe paḍilā | 76 |
hā hā karṇṇa boliṇa dhailā koḷāgrate
āre tumbhara sodara ẏehu, māila kemante | 77 |
bābu karṇṇare abheda kapaca bajra chauṁrī amr̥ta kuṇḍaḷa
kapaṭe tora tahuṁ dana māginele ākhaṇḍaḷa | 78 |
dhīra hoi caraṇa bhūmire paḍibā nimante
śate bhāra subarṇṇa basudhā lāñcha diai nitye tote | 79 |
bābu bāsaba debatā toṣiṇa pāilu bajra ye śakati
ẏete sañchita kari kimpe nuārilu brati | 80 |
ẏe karṇṇaku kemante māilu re arjuna
tohora kalā kr̥tyaṭi hāde debakī nandana | 81 |
ẏe kuru sāgara ye kāhāra baḷe hoẏe jiṇi
upāẏe kari ẏehā marāilu catrapāṇi | 82 |
tahuṁ rodana kariṇa caḷai gāndhāra senara dohitī
dekhai dhuśāsana paḍi achai bikoti | 83 |
dekha dekha kr̥ṣṇa ẏe dhuśāsana mora putra
rodhire pakhāḷaṇa hoicchi ẏehāra ye gātra | 84 |
dhanya dhanyare bhīmasena pratagyāṁ tohora dhani
rodhire pakhāḷilu ye keśa jighnasenī | 85 |
kṣatrīpaṇa kari re samare marāilu
hiā bidāri kimpe rudhira pāna kalu | 86 |
bolai bhīmasena nāhiṁ nāhiṁ mora doṣa
paboṅgra pratagyāṁ sāchā kali go dekhile tridaśa | 87 |
bhīmasena boilā go oṣṭha pātre laili gātra
apakīrtti hoiba boli go na kali garbhagata | 88 |
dropatīra keśa go ẏe dhailā yebaṇa hāthe
se hātha upāḍili go mānagobinda dekhante | 89 |
caḷai gāndhārī ye bidura tule gheni
dekhile paḍiacchi mantrībara śakuni | 90 |
āre bābu tuhire gāndhāra deśa ādhipati
subuddhi mantrī tuhi upāẏe catrabratī | 91 |
anamite mānagobinda kalā yeuṇai kr̥tya
pākṣāṇa ghare pūroi māilā mora tāta | 92 |
tahuṁ uburilu tu tohora buddhibaḷe
pitārakaiṁ kāraṇa tu kalu ẏete kāḷe | 93 |
dekha dekha śrīkr̥ṣṇa ẏe mohora sahodra ye bhātha
upāẏe kari ẏeṭi marāilā samasta | 94 |
bhāiṁki kisa doṣa debā ho jagunāhā
śoka na rahai muṁ dekhikari ẏehā | 95 |
ẏe yebe śrīkr̥ṣṇa na karantā ẏeḍe kr̥tya
kimpāi marante hari ẏe mohora śateputra | 96 |
bho kr̥ṣṇa, kuru pāṇḍaba benibaḷa nimañjilā
śakunira hetu ẏete kr̥tyaṭi hoilā | 97 |
āre āre śakuni tu narkagati pāa
duburddhi paṇe marāilu ẏe mohora pua | 98 |
tahuṁ caḷiyānte gāndhārī dekhilā jadyaratha
ẏe kisa dokṣa kalāre ẏehāku māilu bīra pātha | 99 |
dr̥śīlā ki tumbhar are nuhai bhaẏeṇī
beḷeka doṣa kimpā upekṣā na kalu phālaguni | 100 |
bolai phālaguni śuṇasi go māta
kapaṭe pabhimanyuku marāila jadyaratha | 101 |
banaste hari āṇuthilā se āmbhra bhārijā
dr̥śilāra uprodha beḷeka kalu āmbhe tejyā | 102 |
tahuṁ rodana kari caḷai dhr̥tirāṣṭara rāṇī
aṭhāṇoi bhāi paḍiachanti bahai ghana ghana śroṇi | 103 |
hā hā putrare mama prāṇa samasari
sampada na dekhili andha paṭaḷa bānddhakari | 104 |
ẏe tumbhara bipatti dekhilire bābu
dekha he śrīkr̥ṣṇa saṁpoḍeṇa baṁśa mora nāśakala sabu | 105 |
uccasvare rodana kari debī paḍi galā mr̥cchā
ẏete putra upujāi hoili muhiṁ tucchā | 106 |
bidura sañjaẏa duheṁ tāṁku dhaileka toḷi
boile gāndhārī dekha dekha ho banamāḷī | 107 |
āsa bābu bhīmasena re chāhaṁi tora mukha
kesaneke pāsoribi re śateputra dukha | 108 |
tahuṁ rodana kariṇa caḷile rājārāṇī
byasa sarobara tīre miḷile tatakṣaṇi | 109 |
dekhile abastāẏe paṛicchi driyodhana nr̥pamaṇi
kātare robai debī driyodhana guṇa guṇi | 110 |
maṇimaẏa mukuṭa ye hr̥de śohe ratnahārā
nirmaḷa meghe yehne udehonti daṇḍadhārī
maṇimaẏa mukuṭa bhūmire chanti paṛi | 112 |
dekhiṇa gāndhārī ye mr̥cchāgata galā
sateta hoi puṇi aneka śokakalā | 113 |
kimpāiṁ bhīmasena re ẏeḍe adharma kr̥tya kalu
driyodha jānure kimpe gadāẏe piṭilu | 114 |

div.note: nīḷameghe yehne bhade honti lakṣetārā |(ta, na, kha)

lg.l: kotiẏe kiraṇa raśḷi yeuṁṇa mukuṭa
pādeṇa tāhāku cūra kalure pāpaṣṭha | 115 |
bolai bhīmasena śuṇasi go māta
dropadī jānu ye dekhilā tora putra | 116 |
teṇukari śāpa tāku dileka dropatī
yāare driyodhana tote heu jānubhagna śāsti | 117 |
apāra doṣa go kale tora putra
ajāta śatr̥ku go kheḷāile juta | 118 |
tera barasaku go kalāi niẏama
kr̥ṣṇaku peṣiṇa go māgilu pañchu grāma | 119 |
dūtapaṇe biḷambe se aile murāri
sekāḷe putranta go nuārilu tiāri | 120 |
tuhi ki majāṇu kapaṭe khuāilu mote biṣalaḍa
āhuri āmbhanta kahu tohora muhiṁ poḍu | 121 |
jatura ghareka ye bhiāile kūṭe
rātreṇa tāha poḍidile go kapaṭe | 122 |
sadabāṭi lokanta go dileka ẏeheneka śāsti
kete jhiṁghāsa go sahiba prajāpati | 123 |
āmbhamānaṁku paśite na dileka rājyaku
se kāḷe kimpe na tiārila puaṁku | 124 |
mahdyapātrapaṇe ye puṇi gale janārddana
sabhāra taḷe kr̥ṣṇaṁku kale apamāna | 125 |
se kāḷe tiāriṇa kimpe na kalu go māẏe
ati manda buddhire go abaśya apajaẏe | 126 |

div.note: –pādeṇa tāhāku bhāṅgilma lalāṭa |(ka, ṇa, da, gha, jha, ra)
–dutapaṇe bāhuḍi se aile murāri |(jha, da, cha)
–apamāna dila pheri aile murāri |(keteka pothi)
–na bhāṅgilma kaḷi bime putranta sekāḷe tiāri |(kha, ṭha, na)

lg.l: pūrbara parābhaba māgo adr̥ṣṭaku ninda
sekāḷe nabujhi go ẏebe kimpe kānda | 127 |
puṇihiṁ rodana kari gāndhārī boilā
māilā uttāre mana tora śānti ye nohilā | 128 |
paḍilā driyodhana ye gadāghāta pāi
paḍilā uttāre mukuṭa marddilu kimpāiṁ | 129 |
aneka trodha debī hoile asambhāḷa
mānagobinda rājākaiṁ uṭhiyāi kalā koḷa | 130 |
uṭha uṭha bhāchāre māta catrabratī
kete nidra māure (?) ra hoilāni rāti | 131 |
bāru śateka yukatī tote chamara ṛhāḷanti
haṁsuli tuḷire nidrā na māḍhai niti | 132 |
sahasre paḷa kasturī kepana tohora kāẏe
ẏebeta śarīra kalu kimpe rakatamaẏe | 133 |
chaḷe cahilu ture putra nirañjana pada
atimāne nāma to hoilā māna ye gobinda | 134 |
puṇi bolanti bābu he deba śuṇa tuhi
kaūroba kāminī dukha dekhi deha sahunāhiṁ | 135 |
kehi pati kehi putra kehi bhrāthā nāti
kehibā bandhu bāndhaba pāiṁ kānda chanti | 136 |
kāta śr̥gāḷa kukura gr̥dra toṣa bahi
śata śata mr̥tupiṇḍa bhakṣu chanti dhāiṁ | 137 |
samara nihata bīragaṇaṁka daśā chāhiṁ
beśabāsa keśapāśa hīne śrī harāi | 138 |
hā hā kāra kari kānda chanti dekha dekha
kebā mr̥ta suhr̥daṁka dekhuchanti mukha | 139 |
kebā tāṁka guṇa guṇi kurarī parāẏe
kānda chanti netr̥ nīra jhara jhara bahe | 140 |
kebā bakṣa kara tāḍe ke mahīre gaḍe
kebā prāṇanātha boli ucce raḍi chaḍe | 141 |
candra sūryya yāhāṁkara chaḷa dekhināhiṁ
semāne ẏeṭhāre bhramuchanti bāi hoi | 142 |
aṣṭādaśa kṣaḍiṇī senā mahāprāṇī
yama ghare atathi hoile canapāṇi | 143 |
dekha kr̥ṣṇa bihvaḷa bhānumatī driyodhana nārī
mr̥ta pati bakṣe mathā acchi natakari | 144 |
kānda chanti mote chaḍikari keṇe gala
amiẏa batana pade bāre na bahila | 145 |
birāṭa rāja kumāī uttarā sundarī
mr̥ta abhimanyu mukha maẏane nihāri | 146 |
karṇṇa driyodhanāhiṁku karucchi dhikkāra
netra nīre boiacchi aṁga jara jara | 147 |
kahucchi he nātha chaḍamāsa helā mote
bibhā hoigala sata baḷilā kemante | 148 |
saga bidyādharī saṅge raciba sukhare
muhiṁ sinā ghāṇṭi keuthibi dukha ghore | 149 |
kapāḷe cidhātā mora ẏehā lihithilā
tumbha mukha dekhi yā mo jībana magalā | 150 |
āna rādhugaṇa yāhā taruchanti śoka
tāhāta pratakṣe dekhaacha padmamukha | 151 |
ẏehigari bahu ṇoka gāndhārī ye kale
śuṇiṇa drahasita hoi śrīkr̥ṣṇa boile | 152 |
ye yāhāra kalā karma nuhai ye āna
se kāḷe makalu kimpe bidura bacana | 153 |

div.note:
–‘se kāḷe naklma kime bidura bacana’ pāṭhapare
keteka pothire adhika pātha | (dhr̥tarāṣṭra gāndhārīra
pūrbajanma br̥ttānta) [abaśiṣṭāṁśa parapr̥ṣṭāre]

lg.l: sebeḷara kathā na paśilā tora karṇṇe
ẏete śoka kāhiṁpāiṁ karu debī mane | 154 |
chāla chāla debī go kurukṣetra bali yibā
dvādaśa yojana bhūmi buḷiṇa dekhibā | 155 |
gāndhāī goile ahe śuṇa pītabāsa
ābara rājāṁku dekhi priẏojana kisa | 156 |
lakṣerājā ẏehiṭhāre boichanti nāśa
tāpare tāpare gaḍibanti na diśai diśa | 157 |
śrūkr̥ṣṇa boile sabhāre muhiṁ pāili hāde baḍa lāja
tenukari karāili go pāṇḍabaṁkare kāryya | 158 |
śuṇiṇa baikulye ye boile gāndhārī
tuhi se nāśakalu baṁśayāka debahari | 159 |
ānakaiṁ doṣate muṁ nuthārai dei
benibaṁśa anyoani karāilu tuhi | 160 |

div.note: pūrba pr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara :–
ẏebe bhāḷile go hoiba kisa puṇa
gāndhārī boilā ho śuṇimā mārāẏaṇā
pūrbara pātaka mora ẏeheneka sinā yoga
sañchasi kari hari kahibā mora āga |
gobinde boilā sinā pucchilma murāri
pūrbara pātaka sinā ẏehā bhogakari |
tu yete pachārilma pūrbara bāratā
kahibā tohora go yathāridhi kathā |
śuṇa ẏekamane dhr̥tirāṣṭa ye gāndhārī
saṁhāthe arjile ho yebaṇa kahtā kari |
se kathā tumuṁku kahai muhiṁ bhale
apāra kāḷara kathā ẏe satyasuga bhogakāḷe |
dhr̥tirāṣṭa ādi janma śabara kirāta
tu ye gāndhārī tāra priẏara ẏekamata |[abaśiṣṭāṁśa parapr̥ṣṭāre]

lg.l: ānara carita ẏe nuhai debahari
ẏekai baṁśe tu karāilu ye bairi | 161 |
tohora gyāne nāśa galāṭi mora baṁśa
bho kr̥ṣṇa ẏehimati hou tohora baṁśa nāśa | 162 |
ẏeka sodare ye anyoanvi karāu
ẏehimati toha baṁśa nāśayāu | 163 |
ẏe bacana śuṇi svāmī utasalya kaẏe
uttama śāpa mote dilusi go māẏe | 164 |
muhiṁ se ānaku karai nāśa antakāḷe
mete keda pramāda cintiba rabitaḷe | 165 |

div.note: pūrba pr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara :–
tohora svāmīra nāma aṭai ṛūṣitā byādha
jaritā nāme byādhuṇī aṭu tuhi sādhya
tumbhare pacchījantu na basanti bhūmi
br̥kṣa tejyākari honti antarīkṣagāmī |
pacchījantu bhūmire pe nuāranti cari
nānā jīrajanta samaste tumbhaṁku bhaẏekari |
ẏe mantara samaẏe ẏekagoṭi pakṣī
garbhabhārā sāi se ākuḷa houacchi |
sampāti nāme pakṣī aṭai garbhabatī
pilā karibāku se baḷāilā mati |
bichārai kāhiṁ muhiṁ karibi biśrāma
ṛūṣitā byādhakaiṁ ye bhaẏe tāra mana |
sampāti nāme pakṣī ye bhārijā sannidhāne
ḍimba pāḷibu yāiṁ kebaṇahiṁ bane |
bhārijā boilā svāmī śuṇa mora bāṇī
byādhare śaraṇa paśibā patipatnī beni |
bhārijā bacane se pakṣī caḷigalā
ṛūṣitā byādha mandire āśrama yāiṁ kala |[abaśiṣṭāṁśa parapr̥ṣṭāre]

lg.l: āpaṇe āpaṇe maribe go ẏe hoiba satya
ẏe bacana prāpata heu go mote māta | 166 |
kr̥sṇara bacane gāndhārī pāilāka lāja
bhalā śāpa dili hariṁki hoilā debakāryya | 167 |
lajjāpāi gāndhārī ye hoilāka tūṣṇi
sambodhanā kari tahuṁ āṇanti yujheṣṭhi | 168 |
yujheṣṭhi boiel go māta nakara āna cintā
muhiṁ se anukṣaṇe tumbhaṁku binaẏe bhagatā | 169 |

div.note: pūrba pr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntra :–
baṭabr̥kṣa upareṇa basākalā pakṣī
ḍimba pāḍiṇa se basā jagi basiacchi |
bāḍi katiki jāiṁṇa byadha tā dekhilā
śaraṇa paśicchi toli byādha bāhuḍi ailā |
ẏe mante ḍimba se pāḍilā goṭi śaẏe
niścinte basithāẏe hoiṇa nirbhaẏe |
śategoṭi pilā kalā sampāti nāme pacchī
nibhaẏa hoiṇa se sūsthe rasiacchi |
kakaḍā māsa kr̥ṣṇapakṣa ama rai cithi
ghor aandhakāta kari megha baraṣuchi |
buli buli banaste kicchi na pāilā byādha
bāhuḍi ailā se manare pāi kheda |
niśvāsa paḷāi se ruṣatā byādhabara
mauna hoi basilā byādha gharaṇī katira |
byādhara bimukha dekhi tu uṭhigalma dhāti
śategoṭi putra moḍi āṇilma svāmī kati |
pakṣīmānanta māri āṇi yahuṁ pakāilma byādhakati
dekhiṇa bisma ẏe ye hoilā tora pati |
śaraṇa paśilā pakṣīku nāśilma hanamati
ẏethira doṣa tote abaśya phaḷibaṭi |[abaśiṣṭāṁśa parapr̥ṣṭāre]

lg.l: ratha bāhuḍāi caḷanti dhr̥tirāṣṭa nr̥pati
śrīkr̥ṣṇa boile svāmī śuṇimā yujheṣṭhi | 170 |
chāla āmbhe yibā teṇe nāhiṁ kicchi kāryya
pāṭa abhiṣeka hoi sukhe kara rājya | 171 |
tahuṁ chaḍajaṇe ye karanti gabana
dropatī āge yāiṁ kahanti yujheṣṭhi rājana | 172 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa samastahiṁ br̥ttānta kahile
māẏā caritre śrīkr̥ṣṇa āmbhanta rakṣākale | 173 |
yāhāra taritra kahile na sarai
hele yujheṣṭhiṁki dile rājyabhārai | 174 |
brahmā antakari nuārile māẏā yāhāṁkara
se kr̥sṇa caraṇe śaraṇa mohora | 175 |

div.note: pūrba pr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara :–
ẏete boli naẏana na bujilā ṛūṣitā
ẏe pāpajanma mote kalāka bidhātā |
śāpa bihilā se sampāti nāme pakṣī
śaraṇa paṇilā ṭhāre māilma mora basi |
ẏe janma pāpa yebe kalma na bichāri
rapara baṁśe hebu tu somabaṁśe daṇḍadhārī |
se janme śateputra hoiba tohora
ẏekā jaṇake tāhā kariba apahāra |
śateputra upujāi hua āṇṭhu kuḍā āṇṭhu kuḍi
śaraṇa paśibāre yebe māilma na bachāri |
śāpa dei pakṣī ye tahuṁ caligalā
patnīki gheniyāi praẏāge jhāsa dilā |
śuṇa go gāndharī pūrbara tora pāpa
phaḷilā ẏete tote tahiṁra abhiśāpa |
ẏete kimpāi kahu go ẏehenaka kr̥tya
pūrbara jarjilā phaḷa bhmañjibuṭi ki tathya |

lg.l: trailokya ādhipati aṭanti jagannātha
māẏā rūpe abatari asura kale kṣaẏanta | 176 |
se debadeba caraṇe śaraṇa anudina
badaẏanti sāroḷa dāsa bākyadebī āgyāṁ parimāṇa | 177 | 259 |
samāpto(?)ẏaṁ nārīpaboṅg granthaḥ
